metadata.subject: Business pitch deck for farm-to-table food delivery startup

slides.title: FreshBite Foods
slides.notes: Welcome, and thank you for your time today. FreshBite Foods is positioned to capture a significant share of the growing demand for fresh, locally-sourced food delivered directly to consumers.

slides.title: The Problem We Solve

bullets: 40% of produce wasted in supply chain
Small farms struggle to reach customers

slides.notes: The traditional food supply chain is broken. Produce travels an average of 1,500 miles before reaching consumers, losing freshness and nutritional value while contributing to massive food waste.

slides.title: Market Opportunity
slides.notes: The market opportunity is substantial. Consumer preferences have shifted dramatically toward local, sustainable food sources, and they're willing to pay for quality and convenience.

slides.title: Our Products
slides.notes: Our three product lines serve different customer needs while maximizing farmer relationships. Fresh Boxes are our core offering, Chef Kits add value through convenience, and Local Market expands our product range.

slides.title: Pricing Strategy
slides.notes: Our pricing delivers clear value at each tier. Standard appeals to health-conscious families; Premium targets food enthusiasts who want the complete farm-to-table experience.

slides.title: Sales Approach
slides.notes: Our multi-channel approach diversifies revenue streams and builds brand awareness across customer segments. Corporate wellness represents a particularly high-margin opportunity.

slides.title: Revenue Projections
slides.notes: Our projections show revenue growing from $500K in Year 1 to $2.8M by Q4 Year 3. These figures are based on conservative customer acquisition costs and retention rates validated in our pilot market.

slides.title: Competitive Advantage
slides.notes: Unlike big box retailers or generic meal kits, we've built infrastructure specifically for local food distribution. Our tech platform optimizes routes and reduces waste, creating margin advantage.

slides.title: The Ask
slides.notes: We're seeking $2M to scale our proven model to three additional metro markets. Our unit economics are solid, and this capital will accelerate our path to market leadership.

slides.title: Next Steps
slides.notes: Thank you for your attention. We'd love to show you our operations firsthand and introduce you to the farmers who make FreshBite possible. Contact: invest@freshbite.example.com
